Yes, this is handy to allow images and videos 👍. It would be handy if the comment form is equiped with buttons that would guide/allow even noob insert image, video, link.

It can be handy if zerotalk++ clones has some hint which suggests available operators like in this topic, so these are not lost for 99% users. For example it would pop-up below the search field when you click into the field or would appear as a button/icon on the end of the field and disappear when you start typing. The classic zerotalk has tips when in post editting mode under questionmark icon i think.

1630769724_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
> just add it

Already did and do not see anything changed. For example in the topic list on index is "0 comments" which is english not custom language and my question "how this language thing is working" remains, for example how admin and user select different language.
Update: after on ZeroHello, i click three dots next to ZN logo and select different lang. it changed the wording on my site! Though ZeroHello does not offer language that i want to use... can be good to force my site to use languages/myfile.json of my choice, but how..

> [gitcenter](#comment_6_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): I'm afraid you can't

i see that the index.html has {lang} "variable" inside:
`<script type="text/javascript" src="js/all.js?lang={lang}"></script>`
yet trying to use lang=sk or lang=slovak does not modify the site appearance (languages/sk.json exist), i am unsure why. Looking into page source (zeroframe) i see: `<script type="text/javascript" src="/uimedia/all.js?rev=4555&lang=en"`

thanks, so only options are:
A) translate mysite/languages/en.json file (in case my site does not welcome english speaking people) - UPDATE: i do not see en.json so this may not work
**B) edit mysite/js/all.js - it seems to contain these english phrases**
C) add pull request to zeronet git repo to add new lang. to ZN (nofish is gone atm)

> [gitcenter](#comment_9_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): asking about ZeroTalk++ in particular or are you asking about all ZeroNet sites?

about zerotalk++ , so far i have **edited mentioned mysite/js/all.js searching and replacing english phrases**. I guess my modifications will be lost on next site Upgrade :)
